text:
At Celonis we build a platform
for process intelligence,

and we use process intelligence
to help our customers

to run their business processes
in a better way.

One recent example of such a project
that our customers are building together
with Celonis

and AWS is an AI agent that helps them
in their order management. That AI agent

in one concrete
example is actually replacing manual work

that they have done in
more than 30 production sites.
And what they have done

is manually analyzing
for the root causes of production delays.

What they are doing now, they have built
an AI agent using Celonis

and Amazon bedrock that is automatically
doing this root cause analysis,

And it's saving them more than 240 hours
a month.

We see a very strong demand
and also interest from our customers

to build more and more of these
AI solutions and AI agents.

one of the exciting capabilities of Amazon
Bedrock is the flexibility

and the choice for different large
language models. That allowed our engineers

to flexibly work together
with our customers

and pick the right
one for the right solution.

Looking
a little bit ahead, these AI systems
and AI agents will change how companies will run.

And they will do that by actually changing
the business processes of a company.

As a participant of this processes,
as a tool that helps us to actually

digitize them, as a tool
that actually helps us to redesign them.

And we are proud to shape
that future together with AWS.
